segments.text: I would like to withdraw my money and close my account please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This is a sizable sum . Is there any reason you are closing your account with us Mr . Lee ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I will be leaving the city soon so I have no need for this account .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see . Well for this amount I will have to get my manager ’ s approval .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No problem . I ’ ll wait over there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . This should only be a few minutes . If you would like , there is coffee by those sofas over there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , thanks . Coffee makes me wired and I will be nervous enough carrying all that cash .
segments.speaker: S1
